name: Liquidity unleashed: A research-driven analysis of post-Shanghai liquid staking derivatives
description: LSDs are the #1 most popular DeFi narrative in 2023. This interactive presentation aims to give the participants an in-depth yet intuitive understanding about the LSD space, and equip them with practical tools for their own research analysis of LSD tokens.

speakers.name: Mingxuan He
speakers.bio:
Ming is a quantitative researcher with specialization in DeFi and tokenomics. He is currently a graduate student at University of Chicago studying computational economics.

Previously Ming has worked as a researcher at Nethermind and Polygon.

https://www.mingxuanhe.xyz/
